text: Our greatest guild leader! Happy birthday~~~

Iâ€™m so nervous, this is my first time to celebrate your birthday, although I it hasn't been long since I fell in love with you, but from the day I met you, Iâ€™ve been completely attracted to you. Not only your wonderful voice when you sing, also because of your warmth, positivity and kindness. text: Happy birthday ShotoğŸ’œ Thank you so much for being in my life and always bringing us joy! I'm so glad I got to meet you, you try your best to bring us the best in every stream, you're really great! I love your wonderful voice from your karaoke stream, your soft voice when you playing RPG games and your BOTTOM scream in horror games. I also love how you always gentle in reminding people or informing them of important things and rules, you are a very principled person. You also stand up for your friends and comfort them, which is really warm ğŸ’œ Don't forget you're not alone. If you get hurt or upset, remember you still got us! We will always support you whenever you need it and be your support. You are the best and we are proud of you, out guild leader ğŸ’œ Happy birthday again ğŸ’œ Hope you will always be happy and be the sun shine in our hearts ğŸ’œ  ğŸ’œ  ğŸ’œ
